name: Poo.pi
description: A Project for determining if a bathroom stall is open using a RPi and a door switch.

scripts.ci: istanbul cover --report text -x "**/spec/**" node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha spec -- -u exports -R spec
scripts.som: istanbul cover --report lcovonly -x "**/spec/**" node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha spec -- -u exports -R spec && cat coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.coverage: istanbul cover --report text -x "**/spec/**" node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha spec -- -u exports -R spec

author: Colten Rouska
